title: Countries with the highest proportion of soccer players 2010
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
The Proportion of soccer players is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country The Netherlands.
Country Germany has 1.9 times more Proportion of soccer players than Country The Netherlands which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Proportion of soccer players for 5 number of Countrys.
Country Germany has the highest Proportion of soccer players and The Netherlands has the lowest Proportion of soccer players.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
The Proportion of soccer players is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country The Netherlands.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Proportion of soccer players in the y axis.
Country Germany has the highest Proportion of soccer players and The Netherlands has the lowest Proportion of soccer players.
Second maximum Proportion of soccer players is found at Country Chile.
The difference of Proportion of soccer players between the highest and lowest Country is 9.4.
The Country Germany has the highest Proportion of soccer players, followed by Chile, and Paraguay. Down to the Country The Netherlands which is the lowest.
The Country Germany has 1.37 times more Proportion of soccer players than average.
